intro: The v-item-group provides the ability to create a group of selectable items out of any component. This is the baseline functionality for components such as v-tabs and v-carousel.

active.heading: Active class
active.intro: The active-class property allows you to set custom CSS class on active items.

chips.heading: Chips
chips.intro: Easily hook up a custom chip group.

selection.heading: Selection
selection.intro: Icons can be used as toggle buttons when they allow selection, or deselection, of a single choice, such as marking an item as a favorite.
